title: Education Participation Status Vocabulary
description: Controlled vocabulary for participation and enrollment statuses of people in education programs and course instances.

terms.label: Enrolled
terms.definition: The person is officially enrolled and expected to participate in the program or course instance.

terms.label: Waitlisted
terms.definition: The person has requested enrollment and is on a waitlist pending space or approval.

terms.label: Dropped Before Start
terms.definition: The person dropped or canceled enrollment before the course or program officially began.

terms.label: Dropped After Start
terms.definition: The person dropped or withdrew from the course or program after it officially began, but without completing it.

terms.label: Completed
terms.definition: The person completed the required activities for the course or program in the source system, regardless of outcome or grade.

terms.label: Auditing
terms.definition: The person is participating without seeking formal credit, credential, or assessment outcome in the source system.

terms.label: Other Participation Status
terms.definition: A participation or enrollment status that does not fit another, more specific category in this vocabulary but is needed to represent a source system.
